values:
Today started off so promising.  Well, kindve at least...

Last night we went to a party in Claremont... it ended up being a high school party.  I felt like the uncool college guy who stoops to high school parties.  In any case, I ended up getting home at 2, and had to wake up at 6 to get to work at 7.  Regardless, though, I thought today would be a fantastic day.  Its funny what your mind can trick you into doing... I woke up quite energized, despite the fact that I had little sleep.  I got some coffee, then went to work where I knew it would be hectic... Superbowl Sunday.  

I tricked myself at work into believing that after work, everything would be okay.  In my mind, everything SHOULD be okay.  So I went home and cleaned up a little bit, then waited for my company.  Two weeks ago I decided to throw a little Superbowl party.  Mari, her friend, and Chachi showed up early.  Then Jason came, followed by Justin, then Meadows, Chris and Ivan.  We left my house before the game ended because we all had tickets to see Straylight Run play at Chain Reaction.

At this point, I was thinking... the day hasnt been so bad. Sure I'm a little sleepy, but I get to see a kick ass show...

Here comes the reality...

I sit here with a glass of Belvedere Vodka trying to calm myself.

Before I continue, let me first state that me and Natalie are nothing but friends.  She knows that I really like her, but I've convinced myself that she doesnt think the same about me.  Even despite other issues and events.  Anyway, I knew that she was going to go to the SLR show with Danielle and one of her friend's, Dylan. I thought nothing of it... 

Now hear me out... I do not want a relationship right now... I just dont.  I think I'm wayyy too young for that stuff, and I have a lot of growing up to do before I can committ myself.  Even so, Natalie is somebody I care about... 

So anyway, we get to the show and we see them and we all say whats up and hang out together as we waited for the show to begin.  As we waited, I noticed that Natalie and Dylan are flirting... and I thought, "okay, big deal... its all good."  But then comes the touching and whatnot, and its all right in plain view.  With no regard to who was watching them... I was livid, but I didnt really show it.  I decided to move my way up to the front of the crowd so I wouldnt have to see it.  Why should I have to see it?  With respect to me, somebody that you know likes you a great deal, one would at least TRY to conceal an all out flirting episode.  Sure enough, everybody followed me... I just needed to be alone at that point... alone in my world, at least.  Natalie and Dylan somehow end up behind/to the side of me, in my eye range.  The touching, the flirting, the whathaveyou, begins again... 

At this point I was thinking, what have I done to deserve this? 

Sure, you might not think its a big deal, but put yourself in MY shoes.  What must I be feeling?  It was like a gradual ripping out of the heart.  I was paralyzed in that I couldnt do anything about it.  Crippled knowing there was a blantant disregard for me.  Hurt by what was going on.

I tried playing it off... finally the show ended and Danielle asked me if I was okay.  During the show, Natalie kept asking me what was wrong with me.  My nonverbal response was, "what the fuck do you think is wrong?!?"

So everybody except Natalie, Dylan, and Danielle headed over to Denny's to eat.  We ended up see the band eating... again.  But still, I couldnt stop thinking about what happened.  I know it shouldnt bug me this much but it is and does...

So I talked to Sonny about it, and he thought everything that had happened was pretty disrespectful.  I mean, even if you dont feel the same way for somebody, dont rub it in their face.  Dont act like I'm invisible...

Honestly, I dont give a fat fuck if Natalie dates some other guy... I really dont care.  Thats her business.  I can very well date another girl... but the only thing I ask is for me not to see it.  I dont want to bear witness to what you do when I'm not there.  Let it happen somewhere else.  Doing it in front of me is NOT COOL.

I thought about it the whole way home... and the reasons why she would do this.... and I'm still empty.  I have to work at 7am, but I cant sleep.  This is something that is really bothering me...

Some people have a blantant disregard for others.  Lucky me, I found one of them... a girl who I thought was so amazing.  Someone I could really get along with.  Albeit, I dont want anything more out of her... and God knows she doesnt want anything else out of me... but respect me.

Its funny because I was talking to a good friend of mine about respect a few days ago... and he was telling me that no matter what, he is ALWAYS respectful to others... and that theres a time for games, a time for being a jerk, and a time for being an all out ass... but its all done within the guidelines of respect.  For once you throw respect out the window, you've got nothing left.  Truly wise words.

I dont know what to say anymore... I just needed to vent.  

Sure, some will think that I'm taking this entirely too far... but put yourself in my shoes.  

So much for peace up...
-Raul

With all that is happening in the world right now. The war in Iraq, the presidential elections, the threat of the draft... a lot has been on my mind. But as I was sitting in my room doing research for a speech I have to deliver today, I found myself reading the Tao Te Ching. Fall quarter of last year, I had one of the best teachers ever, Kevin Menton. I learned a lot from him. He introduced me to the Tao and the writings of Lao Tzu. It taught be to be more easy going and observant. Anyway, I was looking for a quote that fits me, and I found one. But then I found something that we should ALL read. Something that was written before Christ, yet still has significance today. When I read it, I thought to myself, why havent we learned from our past mistakes? Here, read it for yourself...
"Do not conquer the world with force, For force only causes resistance. Thorns spring up when an army passes. Years of misery follow a great victory. Do only what needs to be done. Without using violence."
How true is that? I should send that to the White House for the Bush administration to take a look at. ;) Vote Ralph Nader. heh

"Charred Fields Of Snow" A Static Lullaby 'This touch. Last touch. This touch. Won't break me. Now I. I see you. I'm sorry. I'm not sorry. a word too soft to be spoken. wrapped in barbed wire. and traveling amongst the charred, fields of snow. I have become.. wounded. for the souls lost in this display of self rightous ideals. break for I'm the one who deserves this pain. the innocent will find. innocence will find its place in heaven. this pain will not stop. I now dispose of you. one by one their souls will take you over. the pain of thousands, your time has come. to think you have broken us down. you have not. the innocent are free now. and you're condemned.'
A-fucking-men.

August 27th: Killswitch Engage, From Autumn to Ashes, 18 Visions, 36 Crazy Fists
September 14th: Finch, Recover, Counterfit
October 6th: Senses Fail, Underoath, The Bled, Van Stone
October 15th: Taking Back Sunday, Matchbook Romance, Fall Out Boy

I'll be at all of those!

Happy 19th to my good buddy Justin Gomez Enriquez!!!!!!

You're gonna have a superb bday!

Take care, bro.

Man! The past two days have been awesome. Lets recap... Yesterday was great. Me, Alan, Justin, and Sonny went to the Wiltern in LA to watch Straylight Run. They played with Rooney and Ozma, but we werent too interested in that. Straylight Run was friggin amazing. Honestly I've been waiting to see them play since their split with Taking Back Sunday and such. They did not disappoint. Michelle Nolan is a hottie. I took a picture of her. We took lots of pictures that night. I'll post them later in this post. In all, though, the show was pretty okay. Aside from Straylight Run, the other bands sucked. Bought a SR t-shirt. Booya! Lots of girlies though... Today I had work, but when I got off I organized a gathering to go to Chain Reaction in Anaheim to see if we could get tickets to see Fall Out Boy, Name Taken, Armor For Sleep, and Bayside. So I picked up Alan, Sonny, Isaac, and Justin, then dropped off my cousin Leo at my grandmas house. Then we headed to Anaheim... Got there, and we couldnt get tickets. Luckily I asked a few people for some and we came up for 4... we needed 5. So the boss at CR let Alan buy one ticket. Cool! So we got in and man oh man... so many girlies. But anyway, Bayside blew me away. They were fantastic. Armor For Sleep was a band I've heard of, but never heard. They were pretty spiffy. I likeded. Name Taken was sooo good. They didnt play a few of the songs I wanted them to play, though. Fall Out Boy, the headliner, was good. The place was way too hot. Bear in mind that outside the venue it was about 85 degrees at the time Bayside went on stage. Plus bodyheat. It was wayyy too hot. Its quite evident with the pics I took, too. You'll see those later in the post... In all, though, the show was great. Fall Out Boy, Matchbook Romance, and Taking Back Sunday are going on tour with each other. Look out for that. Anyway, without further ado, here are the pics from both nights... Justin looking through the mirror. Sonny giving himself the finger. Alan loved Rooney. Muah in mirror. Evil Sonny. Alan is single! John Nolan... the man! Michelle Nolan. Top 10 hottest women EVER. Jennette and her friend. Me and Jnizzle. Justin spreading his legs like butter on bread. Now isnt that just cute? Candid picture time. Uh oh... Sccaarrrryyy... Justin acting like the model he is. Mother Alan. 'Nuff said... My personal favorite. Yes, Alan really was sleeping. A look from my backseat to the freeway... Name Taken! Isaac's face says enough. FUCKING HOT! We were both drenched... and so are you. ;) Picture with the leadsinger from Bayside. He was a real cool guy. Poor Sonny... Isaac is so hot... but married. Rocking out to Dashboard. I took this picture while driving... looks cool, I think. Thats it for now... goodnight!

Life has been great as of late... Been hanging out a lot with Justin and Alan... On Thursday we went to a show in Azusa that Jennette told me about. Good times in the parking lot. Met Cupcake. The show was cool... horrible singers, but cool. After the show I was driving slow while Cupcake was behind us, so he passed me up and I passed him up and so forth. I think he was getting mad, but it was really funny. Was he mad, Jnizzle? hahaha! Friday me, Justin, and Sonny went to Starbucks, then to the AMC 30 where we pondered why young people (younger than us) are getting older a lot more quickly nowadays. Then Erica called us up and we went to her house to watch The Butterfly Effect. Alan and Rick came over and we talked and stuff. Then they left and Isaac came home and we watched the movie. I love that film. Saturday... I'm a little upset about the outcome of this day... Seriously, what I'm about to write will probably offend you, Sonny. So if you dont wanna read it then dont, but I need to get this stuff off my chest... Alrighty... I've been noticing (and I havent been the only one noticing) that Sonny has been acting differently. Kindve like a girl who's PMSing. Just being cold... well, not quite cold, just DIFFERENT. A LOT different. Not the same person I've been hanging out with since high school. Definitely a different guy. And like I said, not only me has noticed these changes... Well anyway, on Saturday after work I came home and showered and got ready, then went to pick up Justin. Got Justin, then went to West Covina to pick up some paintballs. Then to Alan's house to pick him up to go to the party. Things fell through and Alan couldnt go. So Rick didnt go either. So it was just me and Justin, and I was pretty sure Sonny was gonna come with us. So we called him and he told me that he needed to pick up some paintball stuff from Michael. I told him he could pick it up from him today (tomorrow, yesterday) and he said no... and that he wanted to drive to the party. I told him just to come with us... Okay look, we all know that one drink gets Sonny buzzed, and I knew that there would be a lot of alcohol at the party, so I reassured him that the only way he would be going to the party would be if I drove. I wasnt gonna drink. I have the ability to say no to booze... from my experience, Sonny doesnt. With that in mind, I was just trying to be a good friend and make sure that one of my best friends didnt go to Rosemead, get drunk (or buzzed or what-have-you) and drive home and get into an accident and die. To me, I wouldnt be able to live with myself knowing I couldve prevented that. So I put my foot down... and when I put my foot down I stick to it. I'm stubborn too, but Sonny was just being a jerk and insisting that he would drive to the party... so I didnt give him directions. Sure enough, when Erica got to the party, she told me Sonny called her. Again, later on in the night, Sonny called her again for directions. She didnt give it to him because she knows his problem when someone offers him a drink. She told me he got pissed off. Likewise, when I got to the party, the people who know Sonny asked about him... and I told them the situation, and ALL of them said that I did the right thing. You build a reputation of being a person who cant refuse alcohol and you pay the consequences... What I did was protect a friend. I dont care how you look at it. Whether or not Sonny had ANY desire to drink or not, I could not take that chance. And I'd expect my friends to do the same for me. For example, if I were to, the weekend after I got plastered, go out and got drunk, then again the next weekend, I would have built a reputation of being a person who likes to drink. Right? So if I insist on driving to a party where there would be HARD liquor, I'd be wrong to drive. Its just that simple. And if I was persistant about driving, I'd want my friends to leave me without directions. Its just common sense. So anyway, me and Justin had a good time at the party. Left around 12:45 so I could get some sleep... Woke up, picked him my cousin Andrew, then came home, called Sonny... He told me he wasnt going because he got a speeding ticket last night at like 2. Could this not have been prevented? Regardless.... Meadows showed up and we went to Alan's. Picked him up, then went and picked up Rick. Went to Albertsons, bought some stuff, then headed out to Corona to play some paintball.. It was sooo awesome. Rick has a good welt on his chest. Looks like it hurts. But we all did relatively well. It was a lot of fun. Came home, showered, cooked dinner... then talked to Sonny. Meadows told me he was gonna go to the party tonight at 10, so I wanted to see if Sonny was gonna go early because I didnt wanna go early and be there with just me and Alan and nobody else. He didnt know when he was gonna go, so I decided to just stay home. I'm tired anyway... So we had a talk about last night... I initiated it by telling him I'm sorry for acting the way I did last night, but it was only to protect him from the propensity of something bad that might occur. He said it was cool... but in the tone of voice that he used with me when he was pissed off at me because of a past happening. Something we straightened out awhile ago... So we were talking and I could tell he was mad at me. And Sonny, if youre still reading, dont tell me youre not mad because I know you well enough to know that you are. When we were joking around about blue balls, you were mad... Erica, Isaac, Justin, me... we all knew you were ticked... I know when he's mad. Just like I know when my sister is mad, or when I know any of my friends are mad at me. So he was just giving me the attitude that he has and I was getting mad, but I dont know why he would be so mad at me... it drives me nuts. Like seriously, you have no idea how upset I am. Its really bothering me. I dont like having people mad at me... especially when its for a stupid reason. I know I'm an asshole... I know it. But I try to be good to my friends. I did nothing wrong. Honest to God, there are only a handful of people I trust with things... my parents (to a parental extent), my sister, Justin, and Sonny. Nobody knows me better than them. Honestly. So it pisses me off to know that Sonny is acting like this... gemini or not, dont be pissy about stupid problems like these... because I tend to read too much into things, and I take it too far sometimes.... Dont TRY to ruin a friendship, dude. Because to me, and I know you'll say everything is cool when its not (not to me at least), it seems like youre trying to distance yourself in a way where I wouldnt consider you a friend any longer. I tried to relieve some pressure by talking to one of my buddies about this... he confirmed that Sonny is acting in the way I decribed above. I thought it might just be me... and if it was, I'd confess it. But its not. Dude, dont be so cold. I know youre trying to be, but its only making me not trust a guy who I thought was a good buddy. Anyway, I feel a lot better. I know this will cause a ruckus of some sort. Sorry, but this needed to come off my chest. On a better note, I met someone REALLY cool. She seems like an awesome person. We'll see what happens. Anyway, take everything above for what its worth. I'm prolly gonna regret writing this, but I just needed to. Take care, Raul

The past couple of days have been amazing. Warped Tour was kick ass. I took some pictures, but not with the digital camera, so I cant post those. I got sooo burnt though. We didnt use sunblock. When I see "we," I mean me, Justin, Sonny, my sister, Meadows, little Autry, Leo, Erica, Isaac, two of their buddies, and the Manahan's. Nevertheless, the show kicked so much ass. Seriously. Taking Back Sunday got crazy though. Hung in there. Hidden in Plain View kicked ass. Man, it was awesome. Anyway, today I had work and stuff. But after work me, Alan, Sonny, Rick, and Justin went to the block in Orange. It was fun. We took pictures with a lot of people. It was sooo funny... and fun. So without further ado... I'll tell you... Justin is hotter than his brother... Justin Timberlake. Alan picking his nose for the ladies. Rick with the "yeah, meet me out back to fuck" pose. Humping the wall. Sad puppy dog look. Rick with girls. Alan "spitting some game." Look at that sexy beast... on the left. Me with two girls. After the nipple suckage, Alan was literally begging for more. ...And he got it. Alan was popular with the ladies. Sonny got the girl on the right's number. Heh. After the picture, Alan was seen walking off with the guy's girlfriend. The Picture Of The Night! Supermodels. Give him a hand! Three girls, one me. The guy seemed to like me more than the girl. I tried cutting off the ugly fuck on the right. Rick with two girls. Watch as the girl on his right reaches for his crotch. Studious pose. We are soo gangster. Well, thats it for tonight. Hope you enjoyed the pictures. Great night. Have a good one, -Raul

Yesterday was so amazingly awesome. Twas great. At night me, Jeannette, my sister, Sonny, Michael, Isaac, and Erica went to the Bear Vs. Shark concert. They played with Gatsbys American Dream and some other kick ass band... just cant remember their name. Bear Vs. Shark was incredible. For those of you who havent listened to their music... you're seriously missing out. We were right by the stage the whole time. It was probably one of the best shows I've been to in awhile. From before the show. Man, he is black. When sluts and lesbians unite. Michael. Brother of Christopher Autry. The better looking of the two. Ladies, Isaac is married. Breast shot. Puzzled, but not yet lost. Long lost brothers. So I punched Sonny in the face... ...And he got his retaliation. Girls gone wild? I've heard of getting punched in the back of the neck, but never elbowed. Nothing to see here... Gatsby's lead singer. Good vocals. If Sonny were black, this is how he would look. Lead singer from Bear Vs. Shark. Right in front of me. Guitarist from B vs. S. He was soooo drunk. Chatting it up with Bear Vs. Shark. We were talking about our sex lives. Sitting on the star of my hero... the one... the only... Big Bird! Big Bird is the man. That was from last night. Today I worked from 9-3. School from 4-10. Gym from 10-11. Justin, I'm not the man. You are! abcParagonxyz: if theres one man id want to be... abcParagonxyz: its marv albert. TaSTeMyAdObO: he got fired from commentating knicks games abcParagonxyz: why? abcParagonxyz: who'd he bite? TaSTeMyAdObO: ummm..no one TaSTeMyAdObO: i guess they didnt like the cut of his juib TaSTeMyAdObO: jib* abcParagonxyz: marv albert is a good guy. both in and out of the sack. TaSTeMyAdObO: hahah abcParagonxyz: he's such a biter though TaSTeMyAdObO: youre a biter! abcParagonxyz: haha... i am. i love to bite cock off and put it in my salad. TaSTeMyAdObO: ewwwwww TaSTeMyAdObO: thats gross!!!! TaSTeMyAdObO: hjahaah TaSTeMyAdObO: too gross for even my journal abcParagonxyz: lol abcParagonxyz: you see, when you bite it off, semen comes out... and that makes for a great dressing. TaSTeMyAdObO: thats fucking sick TaSTeMyAdObO: i stopped mastubating since I read that abcParagonxyz: roflmao abcParagonxyz: im putting that in my journal TaSTeMyAdObO: dammit everyone will know im a masturbator abcParagonxyz: fine... i wont put it then TaSTeMyAdObO: hahah TaSTeMyAdObO: put it in TaSTeMyAdObO: i was kidding abcParagonxyz: i was anyway TaSTeMyAdObO: ahahahahah TaSTeMyAdObO: good TaSTeMyAdObO: thats how I wanted it then!

TaSTeMyAdObO: I was watiing for an LJ entry praising me and shit
TaSTeMyAdObO: hahahah

Praise...

The past few days have been hectic. A lot of running around, a lot of school bullshit, and no time to workout...

Monday I had my first day of summer school. I'm taking the math class that I didnt do so well in... But its a computer math class, and that just doesnt work out well for me. Too much self-direction. I need more instruction.

So anyway, I came home and decided to take another class. Might as well. Its stupid to go to school for one class. So I added a sociology class. It meets Tuesday's from 6-10pm. I also dropped my computer math class, and added a regular class that meets right before my Tuesday class... but also on Thursday. Meh... I'm taking night classes so I can keep my morning shifts at work.

I worked Monday and Tuesday...

Yesterday me, Meadows, Sonny, Mike, Chris, Isaac, and Justin played basketball by Mike's house. The first game was really good. We came from behind and won the game. It was awesome. Then we played by ourselves. Then I wrestled Meadows. Lost 1 Won 1. He's tough.

Came home and slept. 

Today is my day off from everything. But Meadows and Justin are going to Pepsi Smash, and Sonny works. Isaac is working too. So I'm stuck today to do nothing. Unless someone calls me up. 

Have a good one...

So whats been going on with me?

Not much, actually.  This past week has been sortve mediocre.  Seriously.

I worked about 26 hours this week.  Work has been easy.  I seriously hang out most of the time I am there.  I've found ways to make work enjoyable.  Its cool.  Plus Sonny is working with me now, and its fun...

During the week I did a lot of nothing, but I did work out 5 times this week.  I am happy about that.  Played a lot of video games with my friends from work.  Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow is the shit.  Also during the week, me, Justin, Sonny, and Meadows played some basketball.  Isaac showed up later.  That day was fun.  On Friday me and Meadows went to a party.  There were A LOT of girls... but they were not my type.  We left early because I had to work at 6am the next morning...

Yesterday we all went to the movies to see Dodgeball.  That movie is hillarious.  I liked it a lot.  The subtle comedy in there is friggin awesome.  After the movie I came home and chilled with some of my sister's friends.  They were drunk.  I wasnt..

Today for Father's day I was woken up early because my dad is spoiled and he couldnt wait to open his presents.  He's a dork.  So he was all happy with what he got.  I bought him a Johnny Cash box set, and my sister got him the Lakers dvd.  Its cool, we watched some of it.  And my mom bought him a lot of clothes... After that I went to the gym, then we went to my grandma's.  It was boring, yet fun.  Me and my cousin Andrew get along well...

Random notes:

<li>My dad told me if I sell my quad, I can get a Raptor.  Thats AWESOME!
<li>My parents are seriously considering buying another house.
<li>I cant get the idea of owning a venue out of my mind.  I am gonna do it.  Mark my words.
<li>I have to go to summer school, god damnit... I HATE math.  Hate it with a passion.  But I never registered, so I have to go through a long, expensive process tomorrow.
<li>Bear Vs. Shark next Monday at the Knitting Factory.
<li>Warped Tour next week.

Thats it for now...

This weekend has been grand... On Friday I took my last final, went to work, went to the gym, then went to Starbucks. Hung out with Sonny and Meadows all night. It was fun just talking about stuff. "Good times," as they say. Saturday was cuter. Dressed up all fancy and shit. Me, Sonny, and Meadows wore suits and ties and stuff and went to the block in Orange. On the way there we got hit on by hot girls, but we lost them because Meadows hit 110 mph. Got to the block, met up with Michael and his girlyfriend. Walked around. More girls... Meadows said two were looking at me, but fuck that shit. Left the block like at 10 and came home. Allen stopped by and dropped off a game he bought me... he's the man. Chilled with Meadows and Sonny some more. Then played XBox with Paulo, Mike, and Allen. It was fun. Today I woke up and made a few calls, and finally it was settled that we would go to San Diego to have some kick ass Mexican food from my favorite restaurant, then to the beach. It was me, my sister, Sonny, my sister's friend Jeanette, and my aunt. I drove. So we left at like 2 and got there around 3:30. Ate... yummy. Then went to the beach. I have some pictures from the beach... Laying down... how lame. Haha, I'm dumb. Beating Sonny. No challenge. More beatage of Sonny. HARR! ...and some more. The sunset at the beach. Now isnt that just cute? Taking time out of the wrestling match to take a picture. Considerate? You better believe it. I like the blurryness... it adds to the effect of being alone in a theatre with Russians and villains with guns against their heads. Cheers! BOOYA! Suplex! My sister... what a doll. Sister and Jeanette. What a cute couple. Sister and aunt. Wow. If only all girls (besides your sister) would lick your nipples... *sigh* Movie star Jeanette. and finally... Sonny playing with his dong. More pictures for you people to view.. Uh huh. Anyway, everything was great today. We listened to awesome music on the way home. Too bad the Lakers lost. Shit. Must go 7 games. Tomorrow I work from 9am-3pm. Have a good one... For God sake, listen to Bear Vs. Shark... incredible.

Today was okay, I guess...

Woke up and went to school to take my music final.  It was soooo hard.  I failed it for sure, but hopefully I'll maintain my B.  HOPEFULLY.

After school I went to the gym.  I work out good when I'm alone, but I'd rather have a partner.  After the gym I came home and took a shower and got ready in anticipation that I wouldnt have time to shower and get ready later...

Met up with Sonny at Starbucks, then went to Cal Poly for my math final.  Got there at 2:30 to study with the guys.  The final was sooo hard, once again.  I needed 135 points out of 200.  I honestly dont think I got it.  I hope to God I did.  Otherwise I'm going to summer school.  Rushed home, thinking I was going to Knotts, but once I got home my sister told me that Sonny called and told her to tell me they took Mike instead because they couldnt wait for me.  Its cool, I guess.

So I played some video games, then I dropped my sister and her friend off at a kickback.  I didnt wanna go because I didnt wanna drink.  Instead I went to Best Buy.  Talked to Rick for a bit, then I decided to shop.  I ended up buying an iPod.  It was really expensive.  Almost $400, but I've been wanting oen for awhile.  What the hell.

Got home and configured it, then went to pick up my sister.  Blockbuster stop.  Then came home.

Tomorrow I'm going with Isaac to the gym, then to pick up my check... its gonna be big.  Then home to wash my truck.  Then whatever comes up...

I love my iPod.  

P.S.  Please pray for my very good friend Justin.  Pray that he can make it through a tough time he's going through.

Been busy lately... Saturday was the Bonus Party Part II for Sonny and my sister. It was fun. Sunday I had to work in the morning, which was a bitch because I went to bed at 4. Monday I had a final for econ. Hope I did okay. Went to the Ontario Mills with Meadows, Sonny, Isaac, and Allan. Then to eat, then to Starbucks, then to my house, then to Isaac's house. It was a lot of fun. All that in mind, here are some pictures I took from those days... Drunk Sonny. Chris and Mike... recently got married. Cute couple, eh? Protecting myself from aliens. My dad said it best when he saw this picture... "man, Sonny was toasted." Without me... :( Now with me... yay! Look at that sexy beast. His hair turns me on. I actually sent this one into GQ. Thank God he smiled. Brothers? From left: Dave, Megan, Paulo. My friends from work. Paulo with the salute. Andrew giving me his award winning smile. Multi-tasking. But look at Anthony... hahahaha! Isaac... what the fuck. Picking the nose. Now isnt that just swell? Caught off guard. Kindve caught off guard. We're so gonna be on billboards one day for like lawyers and shit. I forgot the name of it, but it was on Sunset in Hollywood. Right past the House of Blues. It was fun. There was one hot girl... so hot. This guy kept looking at me... it was so gross. This one girl kept looking and smiling at me, but she wasnt my type. I'm too picky, and yes... too shallow. After prom we went to a Chinese restaurant. I wasnt hungry but they were. So they ate. I was afraid. haha. It was called Won Kok. Ewwy. I was exhausted on the way home. Dunno how I made it home after we got dropped off. Went to bed around 2:30, and then... Sunday: I worked at 8am. I like mornings. We hired a lot of new people, so they're all my bitches. Its so awesome. I dont have to do much work anymore. One guy did all my tasks for me. It was great. Worked from 8-4:30. Came home, ate, then went to the gym with Sonny. Afterwards we went to Starbucks. After that I came home. Starbucks is great. As for next week... Tomorrow I have school, and a game... plus a kickass workout at the gym. Its gonna be real intense. And I'm going to the movies. I was cleaning my room, listening to Ben Harper, and his music hit me.  I seriously froze and thought to myself... "wow."  Now, that RARELY happens to me with music, but this guy is just awesome.

The song was "Walk Away" and it got me thinking about things, and people... and other people who are in tough situations.  I'm gonna post the lyrics... tell me what you think about them, and try to listen to the song as well.

So yeah, let me know what you think...

<center>"Oh no- here comes that sun again. 
And (that) means another day without you my friend. 
And it hurts me to look into the mirror at myself. 
And it hurts even more to have to be with somebody else. 

And it's so hard to do and so easy to say. 
But sometimes - sometimes, 
you just have to walk away - walk away. 

With so many people to love in my life, why do I worry about one? 
But you put the happy in my ness, you put the good times into my fun. 

And it's so hard to do and so easy to say. 
But sometimes - sometimes, 
you just have to walk away - walk away and head for the door. 

We've tried the goodbye so many days. 
We walk in the same direction so that we could never stray. 
They say if you love somebody than you have got to set them free, 
but I would rather be locked to you than live in this pain and misery. 
They say time will make all this go away, 
but it's time that has taken my tomorrows and turned them into yesterdays. 
And once again that rising sun is droppin' on down 
And once again, you my friend, are nowhere to be found. 

And it's so hard to do and so easy to say. 
But sometimes, sometimes you just have to walk away, walk away and head for the door. 
You just walk away - walk away - walk away. 
You just walk away, walk on, turn and head for the door."
</center>

Amazing...

I cant stop... I've been really bad today. I came home early from work. It hurts a lot. Here's a picture of him... he's on the left. Honey is on the right, but you cant see her face. I'm the idiot who looks tired. God I loved them...

I don't feel like updating, but I feel like I need to.  Therapy of my soul.  The past 9 hours have sent me crying, and asking why... I honestly don't feel good at all.  I'm hungry, but I don't feel like eating.  I have homework, but I wanna blow it off.  I have two quizzes tomorrow, but those don't mean anything to me right now.

All that matters is my dogs...

I got home from work last night at 12:20, and got home a few minutes later.  I ate and checked my email, talked to Rudy, then I went outside to feed my dogs.  I feed them around midnight every night because its way too hot for them to be standing on the concrete and eat in the middle of the day.  So I wait till night.  I walk outside and only two of my dogs are there... Hannah and Honey.  Hanz (I call him Hanald), which is my absolute favorite dog in the universe... he means the world to me... he's always been there for me... protected me, loved me, EVERYTHING.... he wasn't coming.  But for the first time, I noticed something on Honey.  Her neck was bulging out.  I came inside and told my parents I was going to the emergency vet.  They told me no, because they know I don't have the money for that stuff.  So, already teary eyed because I knew it wasn't good, I ran outside and looked for Hanald... my dogs like to go under the house for shade, and sometimes they sleep under there... so I was yelling for him, and he wasn't coming.  I thought maybe he got out somehow.  So I looked under the house and seen him.  I was relieved...

So I called him again and he wouldn't come.  Maybe he didn't hear me.  I got on all fours and looked under the house... he wasn't breathing.  I dismantled all the bricks and started balling.  He was dead.  I cry now as I did last night... I went over, punched the wall hysterically, and cried even more.  I cried the whole night, until I fell asleep.

I loved you, Hanz...

Then I woke up and was still crying.  My mom stood home from work... I thought so that we could take Honey to the vet to get checked.

I asked her what time they open... she came over and told me that we don't need the vet.  My dad took Honey to the emergency vet last night when he took Hanz... the doc said she had a massive infection on her neck, and her stomach... she would only live a few days, and would be in pain for much of it.  He recommended the shot to put her to sleep.  My dad obliged.  My mom told me and I cried again and again.

I lost two dogs last night... TWO.  Why does this have to happen?  I don't know why Hanz died.  I cant understand it.  Nothing was wrong with him.  I'm thinking maybe he accidentally choked himself while under the house?  Or maybe poisoning?  They killed a cat a week ago... maybe something to do with that?  I'm searching for answers, and I'm balling.  

There was a point in my life where I really had no friends.  No one I could talk to.  Hanz, even though he was a dog, was a thing I could vent to... and he seemingly understood me.  I babied him so much.  Held him birthday parties... baked for him doggie treats.  He just turned 5... he was too young!

I'm honestly in a state of depression. I miss my doggies.  Honey was his daughter... the only of the 2 batches that we kept.  Great dog.  Loved me immensely.  He always followed me, tried to hug me, obeyed me.. her and Hanz were the best... but now they're only memories... and it hurts to me to think like that.

I dunno what to do...

A very bewildered,
Raul

My ass is getting kicked.  Seriously.

Fatigue has plagued my body.  This is way too much.

Beyond the emotional drainage that has been reeking havok on my inner system, work and school and extracurricular activities have began taking its toll on me.  I really need Thursday to come ASAP...

Today (Wednesday) I have to wake up at 6:30, get to school by 8.  I have nonstop class until 1, then I'm going to the gym from 1:15-2:30.  Shower there.  Go to La Puente High, tutor kids in English until 4, drive to work, change there AGAIN, and work until 11.  This is really too much for me to handle.  I finally get a day off on Thursday, and I'm off until Sunday!  But I've been working a whole lot...

I just got out of work right now, and I've been getting a little over 30 hours a week.  I know you probably think thats a little, but I have a compulsive disorder... I honestly NEED to go to the gym at least 4-5 times a week.  Plus I have school MWF, and I work usually on Tues, Wed, Thurs, Sat, and Sun.  Not to mention I tutor English two days a week.  I havent talked to my family since Friday, in essence.  

Its a lot for me to handle.

Anyway, work was okay.  We had a meeting at Disneyland and it was boring.  Came back to work to find the place in a state of chaos.  Took me and Michelle till 12:15 to get it back in order.  

I'm went with Angie and Brandon to Starbucks to get a coffee.  I'm gonna need it.  I have to do my homework right now.  Hopefully I'll be done by 3.  

Anyway, goodnight for now.

I woke up at 12!  Wow!  But that sucked because I was supposed to wake up at 7 and go to the gym, then go play basketball with the "peeps" in Azusa.  I woke up at 8, but I made the mistake of putting my head back down.  Oh well.

Umm... quote of the millenium...
No context, no author...
"...needs to find a new block to like."

OMG lol.  

Anyway, I have a boatload of homework to do, and I have to leave my house in a bit.  I cant wait till Thursday.  No school, no work.  NICE!  But me and Ely are gonna go to a concert at school...

Oh yeah, yesterday was so weird at school.  Normally there are no hot girls whatsoever, but I was walking to Ely to my political science class, and he pointed out a girl.  And wow... she was hot.  I dont approach girls though.  Then there was another girl who had a kickass body and was overly cute, but yet again, I didnt do anything.  Its cool... I honestly dont want a relationship right now.  

Sex would be nice. ;)

Haha, I'll update later, DOGG.

I just woke up right now.  Actually, I woke up at 5:30 because my dad was in a bad mood and he wanted me to take out the trash.  So to get him off my back, I did.  Then went back to sleep.  Then I woke up with him yelling at my cousin on the answering machine.  Pissy mood.

Anyway, tonight I work from 5-11, and I MIGHT work on Friday from 1:30-7.  Hopefully not though, because me and my buddies are going out.  Perhaps to a club, or maybe just to Universal City Walk.  The codename is: "Find Girls."  I'm not desperate... yet... so I'm still gonna be really picky.  I can say the same for Sonny and Meadows as well.  But its gonna be fun.

Also, next month I'm gonna have a big party.  Its a split party for my sister and for Sonny, since their birfdays are so close together.  There'll be bands and stuff.  It should be awesome.

What else is new?  Yesterday I didnt go to music and I hung out with Justin and Jane.  Wer talked for a long time and made fun of ugly people.  How cute is that?

Oh yeah, I'm going to like 5 concerts within the next few months.  Taking Back Sunday, Steel Train, Dashboard, Warped Tour, and Fernando V.

Oh yeah... one of my pet peeves is when people say "anyways" instead of "anyway."  Please correct this, people.  America will be a much better place to live.

Have a splendid day.

"And you can cry all you want to, I don't care how much

You'll invest yourself in me, we're not working out
And you can't keep my brother, and you won't fuck my friends
and we're not working out, we're not working out
This time I mean it, never mind the times I've seen it"

I try to be a tough guy.  I dont cry much.  

My mom called me and told me I have to get rid of two of my dogs.  I love those dogs...

We got my first dog my freshman year in high school.  Then because he was overly horny, we got him a mate.  Both dogs are full bred German shepherds.  They mated and had a daughter... the only survivor of their first batch together.  I have now had the two female dogs for 3 years.  Two of them are getting sick... but not my first dog.  I have refused for about two years to get rid of two of them... my parents say they just ruin the backyard.  But I cant get rid of them.  They're like my kids.  

So my mom told me I HAVE to take them to the pound, otherwise my dad will just let them go.  I guess I have no choice.  At the pound, at least they have the option of getting adopted by a family.  

I love those dogs.  It hurts to think about them gone.

I tried to post pictures last night.  But the damn website that uploads pictures wont allow me to link externally, so I just deleted the whole entry.

If you want to see the pictures bad enough, let me know.

I havent updated this bad boy in awhile. I've been semi-busy, I guess. This is what has been happening... Big issue. Me and Celina parted ways last week. We figured it would be best if we did this. We were both going our separate ways, and we never had time for each other, so we both decided it would be best to just be friends. We're both young, and we should experience new people before it gets too late. Its hard, but its for the best. About my uncle. He's doing a lot better now. Still in the hospital. Kindve responding now, but the outlook is still pessimistic. Hoping for the best. On Friday my parents left for Hawaii... They left the house to me and my sister, so naturally we had a party on Saturday. Just a kickback type thing. Most of my friends came over, and my sisters as well. Plus some friends from work. It was cool, from what I remember of it. I got wasted really bad. I had too much to drink. I dont like drinking either, its just that I wanted to see how far it would go... I drank a beer (gross), almost a full bottle of wine, 3 jello shots, almost half a bottle of vodca, two mikes hard drinks, and a shmirnof. I threw up 3 times and I couldnt walk on my own. I heard I was pretty bad. Anyway, school started last week and my classes seem easy, except for math. Oh yeah, went to the beach last week with everybody. It was grand. What else? Oh yeah, went to two concerts last week. Both were awesome. Went to the Hidden in Plain View/Jenoah/Allister/Never Heard Of It concert on a Friday. That was soooo cool. Me and Sonny met the guys from Hidden. They are kick ass guys. Then on Sunday I went to the Concert for Compassion. My Chemical Romance kicked so much tail. The entire day was fun. But yeah... Umm... oh yeah, Im having a bbq on Wednesday. If you wanna come on down, give me or somebody that I talk to a call. Take care,

Once again, thank you all for your prayers for my uncle...

He is actually doing a little better, remarkably.  When I thought there was no hope, your prayers helped him to do something miraculous... to give me and my family something to hope for.

He is still seriously sick.  If he comes out of this, he will have a long road to recovery... I just hope he is able to come out of it.  He's a great man with an awesome heart.

Keep praying for him, please.  Me and my family appreciate it...

I told my dad about me asking people to pray for him and he got really happy.  He told me to tell whomever is praying for him thank you.  

Actually, yesterday my dad went to go visit him, and he responded to him.  GREAT SIGN.

So please continue to pray for him.

Thanks a lot!
